summary:
Gives you the right to become the best Dovahkiin ever!!
NOTE: i am working on a new project! mor info comes later :)
descriptionHtml:
--NinjaBlade--
Have you always wanted a mod that can give you over 50k in damage? and so fast you almost cant see it kill? then this is the perfect mod for you!
It is in the basement of the DragonBridge Farm, make sure no one sees you steal it. or you will have a bounty (like 40k or something). in upcomming updates will there become several more places to find the \"NinjaBlade\" and maybe a arena! the Swords will become hard to find in the upcomming updates! :) NOTE! i am working on a new weapon mod! :)

--NinjaBlade--

--Installation--
1. download with manager or without
2. if you download without the manager you must place the .esp file in skyrim data folder, if you download with manager you must download and activate with Mod manager.
3. start the game 
4. ENJOY!!

Version 1.1 is out!!!

New in 1.1
A new NinjaBlade is out
and the location is in Riverwood some place
try to find it :)
author: Khariizma
